Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of Archangel Gabriel:

Text.Language: <ere Gabri/l pifaisennoufi: pinis] qen niaggeloc: nem nitagma eyouab et[oci: etfaiqa t~c/fi n~sah n~,~rwm
Hail to Gabriel, the herald of glad tidings, the great among the angels and the exalted holy orders, who carry fiery flaming swords.
